org.cpsolver.ifs.assignment.context

Interface CanInheritContext<V extends Variable<V,T>,T extends Value<V,T>,C extends AssignmentContext>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - Variable
    T - Value
    C - Assignment Context
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Config, Course, CourseReservation, CurriculumOverride, CurriculumReservation, DistanceConflict, DummyReservation, GroupReservation, IndividualReservation, Instructor, LearningCommunityReservation, OnlineConfig, OnlineReservation, OnlineSection, OnlineSectioningModel, RequestGroup, Reservation, ReservationOverride, Section, StudentQuality, StudentSectioningModel, Test.TestModel, TimeOverlapsCounter, UniversalOverride

    public interface CanInheritContext<V extends Variable<V,T>,T extends Value<V,T>,C extends AssignmentContext>
    An additional interface that can be implemented by the HasAssignmentContext class. The inherited assignment context holder (see InheritedAssignmentContextHolder) can than use this interface to inherit an assignment context from the parent assignment context. If a HasAssignmentContext class implements this interface, InheritedAssignment will use the inheritAssignmentContext(Assignment, AssignmentContext) method instead of the HasAssignmentContext.createAssignmentContext(Assignment) method to create a new context.
    Version:
    IFS 1.3 (Iterative Forward Search)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      C inheritAssignmentContext(Assignment<V,T> assignment, C parentContext)
      Create a new assignment context for the given assignment.

    • Method Detail

      • inheritAssignmentContext

        C inheritAssignmentContext(Assignment<V,T> assignment,
                           C parentContext)
        Create a new assignment context for the given assignment. This method can be used to clone the parent context if desired.
        Parameters:
        assignment - an assignment for which there needs to be an assignment context
        parentContext - context of the parent assignment
        Returns:
        a new instance of the assignment context, filled according to the given assignment
